price: Oni će dozivati: “O Malik! Neka nas Gospodar tvoj dokrajči!”, a on će reći: “Doista vi tu ostajete!”
arabic: وَنَادَوۡاْ يَٰمَٰلِكُ لِيَقۡضِ عَلَيۡنَا رَبُّكَۖ قَالَ إِنَّكُم مَّٰكِثُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wanādaw yāmāliku liyaqḍi ʿalaynā rabbuka qāla innakum mākithūna
